com.dukascopy.api
Interface ChartObjectListener

All Known Implementing Classes:
ChartObjectAdapter
public interface ChartObjectListener

All notifications are called in strategy thread

Method Summary
 void attrChanged(ChartObjectEvent e)
          Deprecated. use PropertyChangeListener working with ChartObject
 void deleted(ChartObjectEvent e)
          Called when user deletes the drawing
 void deselected(ChartObjectEvent e)
          Called when user deselects the drawing Cannot be canceled.
 void highlighted(ChartObjectEvent e)
          Called when user places mouse cursor over the drawing.
 void highlightingRemoved(ChartObjectEvent e)
          Called when user moves mouse cursor out of the drawing area Cannot be canceled
 void moved(ChartObjectEvent e)
          Called when user moves the drawing.
 void selected(ChartObjectEvent e)
          Called when user selects the drawing
 

Method Detail

highlighted

void highlighted(ChartObjectEvent e)
Called when user places mouse cursor over the drawing. Cannot be canceled.

Parameters:
e - event

void highlightingRemoved(ChartObjectEvent e)
Called when user moves mouse cursor out of the drawing area Cannot be canceled

e - event

void selected(ChartObjectEvent e)
Called when user selects the drawing

deselected

void deselected(ChartObjectEvent e)
Called when user deselects the drawing Cannot be canceled.

Parameters:
e - event

moved

void moved(ChartObjectEvent e)
Called when user moves the drawing. Movement of the drawing doesn't rise attrChanged events. Event contains old and new coordinates of the first point of the drawing

Parameters:
e - event

deleted

void deleted(ChartObjectEvent e)
Called when user deletes the drawing

Parameters:
e - event

attrChanged

void attrChanged(ChartObjectEvent e)
Deprecated. use PropertyChangeListener working with ChartObject

Called when user changes attribute of the drawing. Event contains type, name, old and new value of the attribute

Parameters:
e - event
